definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: Sales of a variety of consumer-related products are gaining steadily.
sentences.chinese: 各種消費食品的銷售在穩步上升。

sentences.english: The additional night's stay can help increase ancillary spending.
sentences.chinese: 加夜逗留能夠幫助增加輔助消費。

sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中國物美價廉的日用消費品，也深受當地人民的歡迎。

sentences.english: The wedding expenses in Shanghai are among the highest in the country.
sentences.chinese: 上海的婚嫁消費成本在全國居首位。

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 積分制，會員制不斷出臺穩定消費羣。

sentences.english: What will the euro beggarly for customers?
sentences.chinese: 歐元對消費者意味着什麼？

sentences.english: American prefer buying Japs car and third world consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 日本人喜歡買美國車和第三世界的消費品。

sentences.english: Mypricemap is a smart shopping tool for all shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 比翻天是一個讓消費者聰明購物的工具。

sentences.english: Those who have gone back to non-industrialized sections of the country will not be net consumers at all.
sentences.chinese: 那些回到農村的人將不再是淨消費者。

sentences.english: A relatively high exposure to the U.S. consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在美國消費者中相對高的曝光度。

sentences.english: Netbooks are a hot-selling consumer product.
sentences.chinese: 網簿是一類熱銷的消費品。

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: However, these actions will not cure the post-bubble hangover of the over-extended consumer.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這些行動不會治癒過度消費的後泡沫殘留影響。

sentences.english: Have taken place in people's consumption of a major change.
sentences.chinese: 人們的消費觀念已經發生了較大的轉變。

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓還是電能的過度消費者與浪費者。

sentences.english: This capability provides foundation for support and enhancement the consumption of enterprise services by others.
sentences.chinese: 這個能力爲支持和增強他人消費企業服務提供了基礎。
